1.0.0.name: wordpress/highlight-author-comments
1.0.0.description: Highlight Author Comments automatically displays comments made by a post's author in a distinctive style with no need to edit your template files, etc. All you do is provide a snippet or two of CSS styling to be applied to author posts.
